naslov: PREKRASNA VILA U MIRNOM OKRUŽENJU, SITNO GORNJE (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se savršena villa za odmor u idiličnom okruženju. Specifičan dizajn i netaknuta priroda čine ovu villu odličnom za uživanje u miru i tišini. Dvoetažna villa ima dva kata i veličine je 182m2. Ima 5 spavaćih soba, dvije kupaonice, dva komina, peć na drva, dva balkona, zatvorenu ostakljenu lođu, garažu, veliki vrt cca. 500m2 (mogućnost gradnje bazena), bunar za vodu, septičku jamu... mogućnost otkupa još dodatnih 400 m2 poljoprivrednog zemljišta koje se nalazi uz kuću. Ispod najviših vrhova Mosora, 600 metara nadmorske visine, u Gornjem Sitnom. Okružena netaknutom prirodom, cvrkutom ptica i mirisnim mediteranskim biljem, Villa se nalazi u neposrednoj blizini predgrađa Splita, što Vam pruža blizinu svega što jedan moderan grad nudi. Susjedstva su prijateljska i tiha. U selu možete kupiti domaću hranu, kozje mlijeko, jaja, povrće i voće te vino. Postoji javni autobus 20 m od vile, veza za Split otprilike svaka 2 sata. Neposredno iznad vile nalazi se 'Zvjezdano selo', a samo 30-60 minuta hoda, u srcu planine Mosor, na 850 m nadmorske visine nalazi se planinarski dom 'Umberto Girometta', okružen gustom borovom šumom, livadama i mali ribnjak. Oko Ville nalaze se brojne pješačke, pješačke i biciklističke staze, konobe... Ako se želite opustiti i okušati u vrtlarstvu i cvjećarstvu, na raspolaganju vam je 500m2 obradive površine, a zatim se okušati u kulinarskim vještinama u pripremi roštilja i peke na otvorenom ili zatvorenom kominu. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija je 3% Kontakt: 091/561-5115 ŽELJANA A perfect villa for vacation in an idyllic setting is for sale. Specific design and untouched nature make this villa great for enjoying peace and quiet. The two-story villa has two floors and is 182m2 in size. It has 5 bedrooms, two bathrooms, two chimneys, wood stove, two balconies, closed glazed loggia, garage, large garden approx. 500 m2 (possibility of building a swimming pool), water well, septic tank... possibility of buying an additional 400 m2 of agricultural land next to the house. Below the highest peaks of Mosor, 600 meters above sea level, in Gornji Sitno. Surrounded by untouched nature, chirping birds and fragrant Mediterranean plants, the Villa is located in the immediate vicinity of the suburbs of Split, which gives you proximity to everything that a modern city has to offer. The neighborhoods are friendly and quiet. In the village, you can buy local food, goat's milk, eggs, vegetables and fruits, and wine. There is a public bus 20 m from the villa, connection to Split approximately every 2 hours. Directly above the villa is the 'Zvjezdano selo', and only a 30-60 minute walk, in the heart of the Mosor mountain, at 850 m above sea level, is the mountain lodge 'Umberto Girometta', surrounded by dense pine forest, meadows and a small pond. Around the Villa there are numerous hiking, walking and cycling paths, taverns... If you want to relax and try your hand at gardening and floriculture, you have 500 m2 of arable land at your disposal, and then try your hand at culinary skills in the preparation of barbecues and baking in an open or closed fireplace. Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Agency commission is 3% Contact: 091/561-5115 ŽELJANA
naziv_agencije: Studio Aura j.d.o.o. Agencija za nekretnine i consulting
